snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel was the first senior United States official to officially describe the Obama administration’s decision to reassess providing arms to the opposition fighters.

byline.original: By THOM SHANKER and MARK LANDLER

lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel was the first senior United States official to officially describe the Obama administration’s decision to reassess providing arms to the opposition fighters.

headline.seo: Hagel Confirms U.S. Is Considering Arming Syrian Rebels
